name: Super POTUS Trump
description: A "mini" game tribute to Donald J. Trump's amazing and successful run for the U.S. presidency. #MAGA!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7+ Processor: Any Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Video Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
